Important Information

Safari Guidelines

  • Report 30 minutes before at Palighat Chambal
  • Safari conducted by motor boat
  • Life jackets mandatory for all visitors

Booking Policy

  • Online booking is compulsory
  • Safari amount is non-refundable
  • Children below 5 years complimentary
